info.title: Digital Store
info.description: Digital Store Is a platform to make gift vouchers Digital Store Is a platform to make gift vouchers Digital Store Is a platform to make gift vouchers

get.description: This is a Brand API for Digital Store. This is a Brand API for Digital Store.This is a Brand API for Digital Store.

post.description: This APi is used to pick winners for raffles.This APi is used to pick winners for raffles.This APi is used to pick winners for raffles.

This API provides raffles associated with customers.
This API provides raffles associated with customers.

parameters.name: im_number
parameters.description: This parameter will filter raffles based on the IM number of the user

parameters.name: winner_type
parameters.description: This parameter will filter raffles based on the type of Winner

200.description:
Status would be true only if the data is available in the response.
Below are the details about the API Response -

code.name: code
code.description: This will show the code of the Raffle

status.name: status
status.description: Status can be true or false

campaign_code.name: campaign_code
campaign_code.description: This parameter will provide the campaign code

description.name: description
description.description: This will provide the description associated with campaign

how_to_redeem.name: how_to_redeem
how_to_redeem.description: This will show a text message

marketing_text.name: marketing_text
marketing_text.description: This will provide the marketing text associated with the campaign

mobile_banner.name: mobile_banner
mobile_banner.description: This will provide URL for mobile banner

name.name: name
name.description: This will show the name of the campaign

product_app_image.name: product_app_image
product_app_image.description: It will provide URL for product app image

product_web_image.name: product_web_image
product_web_image.description: It will provide URL for product web image

redirect_url.name: redirect_url
redirect_url.description: It will show on which URL it will be redirected

status.name: status
status.description: This will notify whether campaign is active or not

terms_and_conditions.name: terms_and_conditions
terms_and_conditions.description: This will show the TnCs associated with this campaign

valid_from.name: valid_from
valid_from.description: Start date of campaign and format is DD-MM-YYYY HH-MM-SS

valid_till.name: valid_till
valid_till.description: End date of campaign and format is DD-MM-YYYY HH-MM-SS

web_banner.name: web_banner
web_banner.description: It will show URL for web banne

order_id.name: order_id
order_id.description: Unique ID created by the system

purchased_at.name: purchased_at
purchased_at.description: Purchase date of the raffle ticket and the format is DD-MM-YYYY HH-MM-SS

total_ticket_count.name: total_ticket_count
total_ticket_count.description: This notifies number of tickets purchased

post.description: This api is used to disqualify customers.This api is used to disqualify customers.This api is used to disqualify customers.This api is used to disqualify customers.
This API is used to generate ticket.This API is used to generate ticket.This API is used to generate ticket.This API is used to generate ticket.

get.description: This API provides the banners.This API provides the banners.This API provides the banners.This API provides the banners.This API provides the banners.
This API provides the Categories.This API provides the Categories.This API provides the Categories.This API provides the Categories.
This API provides the gift vouchers.This API provides the gift vouchers.This API provides the gift vouchers.This API provides the gift vouchers.
This API provides raffles.This API provides raffles.This API provides raffles.This API provides raffles.
This API request is to obtain the list of my bookings done on the system. It may contain the pagination feature also integrated

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the bookings based on IM provided.number

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the bookings based on the channel. Sample values WEB / Mobile etc

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: This parameter will filter the bookings based on the status provided. Sample value ALL

200.description:
Status would be true only if the data is available in the response.
Below are the details about the API Response -

message.name: message
message.description: Message will notify if the booking details are found or not

status.name: status
status.description: Status can be True or False

order_id.name: order_id
order_id.description: This parameter is the unique reference generated by the system.

delivery_address.name: delivery_address
delivery_address.description: This will show the delivery address (Address details,City,State,Country code,Pincode)

gv_url.name: gv_url
gv_url.description: URL on which it will be ridirected

gv_code.name: gv_code
gv_code.description: This will show the Product code

validity.name: validity
validity.description: This will show the validity of the voucher and the format will be YYYY-MM-DD HH-MM-SS

miles_accrued.name: miles_accrued
miles_accrued.description: This will provide the number of miles to be accrued for provided IM number

web_image.name: web_image
web_image.description: This will provide URL to Web image path.

mobile_image.name: mobile_image
mobile_image.description: This will provide URL to mobile image path.

purchased_date.name: purchased_date
purchased_date.description: This will provide the date on which the voucher was purchased and the format is YYYY-MM-DD HH-MM-SS

status.name: status
status.description: This will show the status of voucher (Active/Inactive)

name.name: name
name.description: This parameter provides the name of the receiver

mobile_number.name: mobile_number
mobile_number.description: This parameter provides the contact number of the receiver

email_id.name: email_id
email_id.description: This parameter shows the mail id of the receiver

total.name: total
total.description: This will show the total number of vouchers found for provided IM number
